Change.Title: OStringStream removed.
Change.Author: Bradley Lowekamp
Change.Description: itk::OStringStream has been removed. Early in the development of ITK, some compilers did not support std::stringstream. ITK provided a wrapper to hide differences between std::stringstream and the old ostrstream (which has been deprecated by the C++ standard). Modern C++98 compilers implement std::ostringstream correctly and a wrapper is no longer needed.
